page.title: 13In Praise Of Peterlee.
page.content:
{Peterlee is not a very big town but the council are trying to improve it.
Some people think it is boring in Peterlee but there are{playparks,}lots of{grass, a leisure centre}and lots of other things too. In Peterlee town centre the council are going to rebuild the town and make it bigger.
A few bus stops get paint sprayed on and some houses get broken into. The school that I go to is{Acre Rigg {Juniors.}I am in the 3rd year, and when I go to the Seniors, I want to go to{Shotton Hall Comprehensive}because it is a good school.
There are lots of other{schools}in Peterlee such as Howletch, Dene House, Eden Hall and North Blunts.
